acceptOwnership().details: The new owner accepts the ownership transfer.

executeBid(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint2.details: Auction contract can decide to either:      - revert / process bid      - continue / complete auction

params.accountId: ID of account which is being liquidated. assumed to be controlled by this manager
params.bidAmount: Cash amount liquidator is offering for portion of account.
params.liquidatorId: Liquidator account ID. assumed to be controlled by this manager
params.portion: Portion of account that is requested to be liquidated.
params.reservedCash: Cash amount to ignore in liquidated account's balance.

handleAdjustment(uint256,uint256,address.details: a manager should properly check the final stateo of an account

params.tradeId: unique number attached to a batched transfers.                It is possible that this hook will receive multiple calls with different tradeIds within 1 transaction if there were                recursive calls to Account.submitTransfer (call submitTrnasfer again in this hook).

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

payLiquidationFee(uint256,uint256,uint25.details: the liquidation module can request manager to pay the liquidation fee from liquidated account at start of auction

params.recipient: Account receiving the fee, may NOT be controlled by this manager

pendingOwner().details: Returns the address of the pending owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.bypassed: true to bypass OI fee, false to charge OI fee
params.caller: msg.sender to Accounts, caller reported by handleAdjustment

setFeeRecipient(uint256).details: Governance determined account to receive OI fee

setMaxAccountSize(uint256).details: set max amount of assets in a single account

settleInterest(uint256).details: settle pending interest on an account

transferOwnership(address).details: Starts the ownership transfer of the contract to a new account. Replaces the pending transfer if there is one. Can only be called by the current owner.

executeBid(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint2.notice: Transfers portion of account to the liquidator.         Transfers cash to the liquidated account.

handleAdjustment(uint256,uint256,address.notice: triggered at the end of a tx when any balance of the account is updated

setFeeBypassedCaller(address,bool).notice: Governance determined tx msg.sender to Accounts that can bypass OI fee on perp or options

setWhitelistedCallee(address,bool).notice: Governance determined whitelist that can be called during processManagerData
